title: Casper's SSD [RX4E4Z]
description:
Yay! My shiny new 2TB drive arrived this week (Toshiba Canvio - HDTC720EK3CA, if you're interested), so I've spent a few days transferring from the old 1.5TB unit, as well as adding back some old/bad games I had archived off to make space - see link below for full list. I am also getting some new games, now I have the space, so will upload even more soon.

Game Name [ID] [FORMAT] : Wii Casper's Scare School - Spooky Sports Day [RX4E4Z] [WBFS]
Language                : ENGLISH (maybe others, not checked)
Type                    : Ghostly Sports Mini Games


** IMPORTANT **
Please seed to at least 200%/2.0 each (i've got my uTorrent set to 500%/5.0).
Do not just leech and run. Help others get a chance to download it quickly too. I'm doing this to help. Please help too.

As ever, if you like it, maybe buy a Wii game to keep the franchise going as a thank-you for this freebie! Even better, get one not listed on here, and upload for me :-)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

All of my 740+ of my Wii games are listed here (text file format directory listing):          <a href="
http://txt.do/0v5n" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://txt.do/0v5n</a>

Feel free to search and see if there is a missing one you want me to upload - add a request in the comments and i'll try to help out.

Please Google the title or game ID if you want to know about this or any of the other games, as I can't remember half of them myself to answer any questions. Also check YouTube for a review/demo of games, as some are pretty crap (like Ninjabread Man and the Billy the Wizard). Those are just for OCD people like me who simply *must* get all the Wii games they can...
